channel.description: Recent content in NTUST on Jonathan's Blog

item.title: (課程筆記)(NTUST) Information Retrieval
item.description: HW1 - Vector Space Model TF、IDF計算方式: 一開始會讀取document的資料前處理，先去做一些normalized，讓lexicon不要有重複的term，而為了讓程式能在1分鐘內跑完，lexicon使用c++的unordered_map下去存，unordered_map使用hash func

item.title: (課程筆記)(NTUST) Network Communication Protocols
item.description: Layered Outline What’s a protocol? protocols define format, order of messages sent and received among network entities, and actions taken on message transmission, receipt TCP/IP 5 Layer Application Layer HTTP、DHCP、RPC、P2P、DNS Transport Layer UDP、TCP Network Layer (IP) IP、ICMP、OSPF、BGP Data-link Layer (MAC) MAC、VLAN、STP Physical Layer 網路挑線 ISO/OSI 7 Layer  Presentation: allow applications to interpret meaning of data. example: encryption, compression, machine-specific conventions.  Session: synchronization, checkpointing, recovery of data exchange. 只要是在網絡上跑的包，都是完整的
